name: Pymp
description:
Pymp is a colorful, fast-paced arcade game with two game modes. As you progress through the levels, the colors, designs and difficulty change. Try to reach as far as possible, it's worth it!

In Avoid Mode, you have to avoid the rectangles and collect the triangles in order to proceed. The other mode, Collect Mode, is unlockable (and fun!). If you make one mistake in either mode, the run is over!

Use the mouse or keyboard.
Keyboard controls:

  • Select: enter
  • Move: arrow keys or WASD
